product_name: CHANELN°1 DE CHANEL Revitalizing Eye Cream
summary: SummaryA refreshing gel-cream that smooths and de-puffs the eye area for a brighter appearance. Immediately after application, elasticity is restored by 11%*. Skin appears 39% more radiant*. After 1 month, wrinkles around the eyes appear visibly diminished by 32%** and dark circles look reduced by 27%***.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsAt the heart of the N°1 DE CHANEL line is the Red Camellia flower, whose revitalizing powers and extraordinary energy give it perennial youth.Red Camellia Extract, which targets the first 5 signs of aging and supports skin's vitality, unites with a unique light complex for an instantly energized, radiant look.Red Camellia Oil delivers comfort and helps maintain barrier function, while camellia water leaves skin feeling fresh.FeaturesThe N°1 DE CHANEL collection seeks to minimize its environmental impact with sustainably developed formulas that contain up to 97% naturally derived ingredients.Each product is housed in environmentally sound packaging for a reduced carbon footprint.Tested on all skin types, including sensitive.*Clinical evaluation of 41 women immediately after use**Clinical evaluation of 41 women after 1 month of use***Clinical evaluation of 22 women after 1 month of useItem 2589594How To UseWith your fingertips, apply to the entire eye area morning and evening. Continue your ritual with the N°1 DE CHANEL serum and cream.IngredientsCamellia Japonica Flower Water, Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Squalane, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Propanediol, Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Faex (Yeast Extract), Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Siegesbeckia Orientalis Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cellulose, Lecithin, Phospholipids, Sclerotium Gum, Chlorphenesin, Escin, Caprylyl Glycol, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Maltodextrin, Beta-Sitosterol, Arginine, Tocopherol, Adenosine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lactic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Tin Oxide, Sodium Benzoate, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Mica, IL57A.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: With your fingertips, apply to the entire eye area morning and evening. Continue your ritual with the N°1 DE CHANEL serum and cream.

reviews.headline: Best eye cream!
reviews.comments: This is the best eye cream ever! I'm allergic to everything and this is fantastic! It dries fast too! A little goes a long way

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: My new favorite eye cream! I'm over 40 with fine lines under my eyes. Since using this, they are a lot smoother and can wear powder under my eyes and my lines stay smoothed and faint. So happy the Ulta Chanel consultant gave me samples to test.

reviews.headline: BEST EYE CREAM WORTH EVERY PENNY
reviews.comments: This eye cream smooths out those fine lines, helps your lashes grow is not greasy and soaks right in. I cannot recommend enough I will never be without it. I am on my 4th jar. I scawked at the price at first, oh no never again it's worth it 100%

reviews.headline: I would DEFINITELY buy this and would DEFINITELY recommend i
reviews.comments:
What a GREAT product!!! LOVE IT A LOT!!
By using once can tell the difference!!

reviews.headline: Too light
reviews.comments:
Really refreshing, maybe hydrating but the texture is too light. I'm over 60 years old and I need a more rich eye cream. I thought that a NEW Chanel product should really make a difference, but I was wrong.
Perhaps this eye cream is OK for young or fat skins.

reviews.headline: This eye cream is the best!
reviews.comments: I am really glad that the Channel consultant recommended this eye cream.

reviews.headline: meh
reviews.comments:
Very hydrating, but did nothing for my dark circles.
It's a nice eye cream, but I was expecting a lot more from DE Chanel for the price and the name.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I've only been using this product for 3 days but so far I love it!

reviews.headline: Chanel products are great!
reviews.comments: Under my eyes, lightly on lids and brow.

reviews.headline: Second time buying this product
reviews.comments: You don't need to apply much. I use it at night under my eyes to reduce the puffiness.

reviews.headline: pricey but it works amazing
reviews.comments: I use this as my nightly eye cream, and it takes away any dark bags and makes my under eyes look hydrated and full! all descriptions are true as advertised! wish it wasn't so expensive but youre paying for quality and brand name. A little goes a long way, so at least it'll last awhile.

reviews.headline: good but not sure if it's worth the price
reviews.comments: so far it's been a good product, been evening out my under eye and making it more puffy, I've learned to dab not rub the product, it seems to work better when you tap it on.

reviews.headline: best eye cream ever
reviews.comments: This gel texture is perfect for an eye cream! Absorbs right away so I can get to my makeup yea I feel so plumped and hydrated. Worth every cent

reviews.headline: A winner!
reviews.comments: This is a terrific eye gel-cream.  The texture and weight is light-medium and so no heavy gunky feeling under your eyes, it handles it all: lack of moisture, puffiness, lines, dark circles.  The weight of this is such that if you want to follow up with a secondary application of a favorite eye cream (out of habit or just for more intense moisturization) you would still be a-ok in terms of nothing too weighty under the eyes.  This is a fantastic eye gel-cream!

reviews.headline: Great for extremely sensitive eyes
reviews.comments: The most amazing lightweight super moisturizing eye cream ! Great for my exzema prone eye area

reviews.headline: Yes yes
reviews.comments: It's just so smooth and I just love it

reviews.headline: So far so good
reviews.comments: A nice eye cream. Has a nice smell, Leaves my eye area moisture all day. As far as the firmness haven't seen much but I'll give it 3 weeks and see how it goes.

reviews.headline: Extremely hydrating
reviews.comments: I have extremely dry under eyes skin with lots of fine lines. The eye cream hydrates my under eye skin and keeps it smooth. It refreshes and hydrates my under eye skin and makes my eyes looks fresh. Formula doesn't run and go into your eyes.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Gel-type moisturize for eye area that melts right into my skin around my eyes & instantly feels hydrated & soft. Made a difference the first day.

reviews.headline: Not as moisturizing as I need
reviews.comments: This product did not moisturize enough. After an hour my fine lines were deep with my normal creamy concealer. It did smell nice and was easy to apply. I would say its good if you're under 30 years old, but not for over 40 fine wrinkles.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have extremely dry under eyes skin with lots of fine lines. The eye cream hydrates my under eye skin and keeps it smooth. It refreshes and hydrates my under eye skin and makes my eyes looks fresh. Formula doesn't run and go into your eyes.
faceoff_positive.headline: Extremely hydrating

faceoff_negative.comments: This product did not moisturize enough. After an hour my fine lines were deep with my normal creamy concealer. It did smell nice and was easy to apply. I would say its good if you're under 30 years old, but not for over 40 fine wrinkles.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not as moisturizing as I need

rollup.name: N°1 DE CHANEL Revitalizing Eye Cream
